hints.label: thm-main-explicit-rate
hints.title: Main Result: Explicit Convergence Rate
hints.content:
935: :label: thm-main-explicit-rate
936: 
937: Under the assumptions of Stage 0.5 (QSD regularity R1-R6) and the parameter condition:
938: 
939: $$
940: \sigma^2 > \sigma_{\text{crit}}^2 := \frac{2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} + C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} + A_{\text{jump}}}{\lambda_{\text{LSI}}}
941: $$
942: 
943: the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to the QSD with rate:
944: 
945: $$
946: \boxed{\alpha_{\text{net}} = \frac{1}{2}\left(\lambda_{\text{LSI}} \sigma^2 - 2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} - C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} - A_{\text{jump}}\right)}
947: $$
hints.raw_directive:
932: ## 10. Conclusion
933: 
934: :::{prf:theorem} Main Result: Explicit Convergence Rate
935: :label: thm-main-explicit-rate
936: 
937: Under the assumptions of Stage 0.5 (QSD regularity R1-R6) and the parameter condition:
938: 
939: $$
940: \sigma^2 > \sigma_{\text{crit}}^2 := \frac{2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} + C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} + A_{\text{jump}}}{\lambda_{\text{LSI}}}
941: $$
942: 
943: the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to the QSD with rate:
944: 
945: $$
946: \boxed{\alpha_{\text{net}} = \frac{1}{2}\left(\lambda_{\text{LSI}} \sigma^2 - 2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} - C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} - A_{\text{jump}}\right)}
947: $$
948:
